trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Move-Item
trans-unit.target: Move-Item

trans-unit.source: Move-Item
trans-unit.target: Move-Item

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Moves an item from one location to another.
trans-unit.target: 將項目從某個位置移動到另一個位置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The Move-Item cmdlet moves an item, including its properties, contents, and child items, from one location to another location.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item Cmdlet 會將項目 (包括其屬性、內容及子項目) 從一個位置移到另一個。

trans-unit.source: The locations must be supported by the same provider.
trans-unit.target: 移動的位置需由同一個提供者支援。

trans-unit.source: For example, it can move a file or subdirectory from one directory to another or move a registry subkey from one key to another.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它可以將檔案或子目錄從一個目錄移至另一個，或將登錄子機碼從一個機碼移至另一個。

trans-unit.source: When you move an item, it is added to the new location and deleted from its original location.
trans-unit.target: 當您移動項目後，就會將它加到新位置，並從其原始位置中刪除。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command moves the Test.txt file from the C: drive to the E:\Temp directory and renames it from "test.txt" to "tst.txt".
trans-unit.target: 此命令將 Test.txt 檔案從 C: 磁碟機移至 E:\Temp 目錄，並將它由 "test.txt" 重新命名為 "tst.txt"。

trans-unit.source: This command moves the C:\Temp directory and its contents to the C:\Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將 C:\Temp 目錄和其內容移至 C:\Logs 目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Temp directory, and all of its subdirectories and files, then appear in the Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: Temp 目錄和其所有子目錄及檔案便會顯示在 Logs 目錄中。

trans-unit.source: This command moves all of the text files (*.txt) in the current directory (represented by a dot (.)) to the C:\Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將目前目錄 (以點 (.) 表示) 中的所有文字檔案 (*.txt) 移至 C:\Logs 目錄。

trans-unit.source: This command moves all of the text files from the current directory and all subdirectories, recursively, to the C:\TextFiles directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將所有文字檔案從目前的目錄和所有子目錄以遞迴方式移至 C:\TextFiles 目錄。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-ChildItem cmdlet to get all of the child items in the current directory (represented by the dot \[.\]) and its subdirectories that have a *.txt file name extension. It uses the Recurse parameter to make the retrieval recursive and the Include parameter to limit the retrieval to *.txt files.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Get-childitem cmdlet 取得所有子系的項目在目前的目錄 (以點 \[。\]) 及其子目錄具有 *副檔名.txt。它使用 Recurse 參數來擷取和使用 Include 參數限定擷取 *.txt 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) sends the results of this command to Move-Item, which moves the text files to the TextFiles directory.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會將此命令的結果傳送至 Move-Item，而其會將文字檔案移至 TextFiles 目錄。

trans-unit.source: If files being moved to C:\Textfiles have the same name, Move-Item displays an error and continues, but it moves only one file with each name to C:\Textfiles.
trans-unit.target: 如果要移至 C:\Textfiles 的檔案有相同名稱，Move-Item 會顯示錯誤並繼續，但是它只會每個名稱各移動一個檔案至 C:\Textfiles。

trans-unit.source: The other files remain in their original directories.
trans-unit.target: 其他檔案仍會留在原始的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: If the Textfiles directory (or any other element of the destination path) does not exist, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Textfiles 目錄 (或目的地路徑的任何其他項目) 不存在，命令就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The missing directory is not created for you, even if you use the Force parameter.
trans-unit.target: 即使您使用 Force 參數，系統也不會為您建立遺漏的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Move-Item moves the first item to a file called "Textfiles" and then displays an error explaining that the file already exists.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item 會將第一個項目移至稱為 "Textfiles" 的檔案，然後顯示說明該檔案已存在的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Also, by default, Get-ChildItem does not move hidden files.
trans-unit.target: 此外，根據預設，Get-Childitem 不會移動隱藏的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To move hidden files, use the Force parameter with Get-ChildItem.
trans-unit.target: 如果要移動隱藏的檔案，請使用 Force 參數搭配 Get-ChildItem。

trans-unit.source: Note: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, when using the **Recurse** parameter of the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, the value of the **Path** parameter must be a container.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，使用 **Recurse** Get-childitem 指令程式的值參數 **路徑** 參數必須是一個容器。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Include** parameter to specify the .txt file name extension filter (`Get-ChildItem -Path .\* -Include *.txt -Recurse | Move-Item -Destination C:\TextFiles`).
trans-unit.target: 使用 **包含** 參數來指定.txt 副檔名篩選 (`Get-ChildItem -Path .\* -Include *.txt -Recurse | Move-Item -Destination C:\TextFiles`)。

trans-unit.source: This command moves the registry keys and values within the MyCompany registry key in HKLM\Software to the MyNewCompany key.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將 HKLM\Software 中的登錄機碼，和 MyCompany 登錄機碼內的登錄機碼值移至 MyNewCompany 機碼。

trans-unit.source: The wildcard character (*) indicates that the contents of the MyCompany key should be moved, not the key itself.
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元 (*) 表示應移動 MyCompany 機碼的內容，而非機碼本身。

trans-unit.source: In this command, the optional Path and Destination parameter names are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 在此命令中，會省略選擇性的 Path 和 Destination 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This command moves the Logs\[Sept\`06\] directory (and its contents) into the Logs\[2006\] directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將記錄檔\[年 9 月\`06\] 到記錄檔目錄 （和其內容）\[2006年\] 目錄。

trans-unit.source: The LiteralPath parameter is used instead of Path, because the original directory name includes left bracket and right bracket characters ("\[" and "\]").
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath 參數使用，而非路徑，因為原始的目錄名稱包含左括號和右括號字元 ("\["和"\]")。

trans-unit.source: The path is also enclosed in single quotation marks (' '), so that the backtick symbol (\`) is not misinterpreted.
trans-unit.target: 路徑也會括在單引號 (' ')，因此倒單引號 (\`) 不會誤譯。

trans-unit.source: The Destination parameter does not require a literal path, because the Destination variable also must be enclosed in single quotation marks, because it includes brackets that can be misinterpreted.
trans-unit.target: Destination 參數不需要常值路徑，因為 Destination 變數也必須括在單引號中，原因是它包含可能會誤譯的中括弧。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 "User01" 或 "Domain01\User01"，或輸入 PSCredential 物件，例如 Get-Credential Cmdlet 產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 若您輸入使用者名稱，將會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 與 Windows PowerShell 一起安裝的任何提供者皆不支援此參數。

trans-unit.source: -Destination
trans-unit.target: 目的端

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the location where the items are being moved.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移動之項目所在位置的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted, but the result must specify a single location.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元，但是結果必須指定單一位置。

trans-unit.source: To rename the item being moved, specify a new name in the value of the Destination parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重新命名移動的項目，請在 Destination 參數的值指定新名稱。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Omits the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 省略指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供者的格式或語言指定篩選。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 篩選的語法 (包括是否使用萬用字元) 取決於提供者。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects, rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 篩選比其他參數更有效率，因為提供者會在抓取物件時套用篩選，而不是讓 Windows PowerShell 抓取物件後篩選。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Allows the cmdlet to move an item that writes over an existing read-only item.
trans-unit.target: 允許 Cmdlet 移動會覆寫現有唯讀項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: Implementation varies from provider to provider.
trans-unit.target: 實作會依提供者而異。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: Even using the Force parameter, the cmdlet cannot override security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 Force 參數，Cmdlet 仍然無法覆寫安全性限制。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Moves only the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 只移動指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the current location of the items.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目之目前位置的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Path, the value of LiteralPath is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 與 Path 不同，LiteralPath 將完全依照其輸入值來使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Passes an object representing the item to the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 將代表項目的物件傳遞給管線。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the current location of the items.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目之目前位置的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to Move-Item.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將包含路徑的字串傳送至 Move-Item。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or an object representing the moved item.
trans-unit.target: 無或物件，表示已移動的項目。

trans-unit.source: When you use the Passthru parameter, Move-Item generates an object representing the moved item.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Passthru 參數時，Move-Item 會產生代表移動之項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: Move-Item will move files between drives that are supported by the same provider, but it will move directories only within the same drive.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item 會在同一提供者支援的磁碟機之間移動檔案，但它只會在同一個磁碟機內移動目錄。

trans-unit.source: Because a Move-Item command moves the properties, contents, and child items of an item, all moves are recursive by default.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Move-Item 命令會移動屬性、內容及項目的子項目，故所有移動預設為遞迴方式。

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Move-Item by its built-in aliases, "move", "mv", and "mi".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用內建的別名 "move"、"mv" 及 "mi" 來參照 Move-Item。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: The Move-Item cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item Cmdlet 是針對與任何提供者公開的資料搭配使用所設計。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PsProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 "Get-PsProvider"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: New-Item
